valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 3 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 4 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low 250 miles west of Rockall 963 moving steadily northeast, losing its identity by midday tomorrow
